00025 #ifndef _CIRCLE_H_
00026 #define _CIRCLE_H_
00027 
00028 #include "Debug.nxc"
00029 #include "Vector.nxc"
00030 
00031 struct Circle
00032 {
00033     Vector center;
00034     long radius;
00035 };
00036 
00045 bool CircleIntersectCircle(Vector &circleACenter, long circleARadius,
00046                            Vector &circleBCenter, long circleBRadius,
00047                            Vector &retIntersect1, Vector &retIntersect2)
00048 {
00049     long d, a, h;
00050     Vector M;
00051 
00052     /* Distance between the two centers */
00053     d = VectorGetDistanceVec(circleACenter, circleBCenter);
00054     
00055     if ((circleARadius + circleBRadius) < d)
00056     {
00057         return false; /* No intersection possible */
00058     }
00059     if (d == 0)
00060     {
00061         return false; /* Circles overlap. No unique solutions */
00062     }
00063 
00064     /* Distance between the center of first circle from the mid point of
00065      * intersections.
00066      */
00067     a = (circleARadius * circleARadius  - circleBRadius * circleBRadius + d * d)/(2 * d);
00068     
00069     /* Perpendicular height of intersection points from the line joining
00070      * the two centers of the circles.
00071      */
00072     h = circleARadius * circleARadius - a * a;
00073     h = Sqrt(h);
00074     
00075     /* Mid point of intersections: M = Ca + a(Cb - Ca)/d */
00076     M = circleBCenter;
00077     VectorSubtract(M, circleACenter);
00078     VectorScale(M, a);
00079     VectorReduce(M, d);
00080     VectorAdd(M, circleACenter);
00081     
00082     retIntersect1.x = M.x + (h * (circleBCenter.y - circleACenter.y))/d;
00083     retIntersect1.y = M.y - (h * (circleBCenter.x - circleACenter.x))/d;
00084     retIntersect2.x = M.x - (h * (circleBCenter.y - circleACenter.y))/d;
00085     retIntersect2.y = M.y + (h * (circleBCenter.x - circleACenter.x))/d;
00086     return true;
00087 }
00088 
00099 bool CircleIntersectLine(Vector &circle, long radius,
00100                          Vector &pointA, Vector &pointB,
00101                          Vector &retIntersect1, Vector &retIntersect2)
00102 {
00103     long a, b, c, u1, u2, t, distance;
00104     Vector A, B, T;
00105 
00106     A = pointA;
00107     B = pointB;
00108 
00109     /* A long line will overlow the maths below, so trim the line segment */
00110     while (VectorGetDistanceVec(A, B) > 500)
00111     {
00112         VectorSubtract(B, A);
00113         VectorReduce(B, 2);
00114         VectorAdd(B, A);
00115     }
00116 
00117     /* Eqt: a = (x2 - x1)^2 + (y2 - y1)^2 */
00118     a = (B.x - A.x) * (B.x - A.x) + (B.y - A.y) * (B.y - A.y);
00119     // NumOut(0, LCD_LINE1, a, true);
00120     
00121     /* Eqt: b = 2[(x2 - x1)(x1 - x3) + (y2 - y1)(y1 - y3)] */
00122     b = 2 * ((B.x - A.x) * (A.x - circle.x) + (B.y - A.y) * (A.y - circle.y));
00123     // NumOut(0, LCD_LINE2, b, false);
00124     
00125     /* Eqt: c = x3^2 + y3^2 + x1^2 + y1^2 - 2(x3 * x1 + y3 * y1) - r2 */
00126     c = circle.x * circle.x + circle.y * circle.y + A.x * A.x + A.y * A.y -
00127         2 * (circle.x * A.x + circle.y * A.y) - radius * radius;
00128     // NumOut(0, LCD_LINE3, c, false);
00129 
00130     /* FIXME: t can easily overflow */
00131     /* Eqt: u = (-b +/- sqrt(b^2 - 4 * a * c((2 * a) */
00132     t = b * b - 4 * a * c;
00133     
00134     // NumOut(0, LCD_LINE4, t, false); Wait(2000);
00135     
00136     if (t < 0) /* Line does not intersect */
00137     {
00138         return false;
00139     }
00140     else if (t == 0) /* Only one intersection point */
00141     {
00142         u1 = -b * 1000 / (2 * a);
00143         u2 = u1;
00144     }
00145     else /* Two intersection points. Solve u proper */
00146     {
00147         long s = Sqrt(t);
00148         u1 = (-b + s) * 1000 / (2 * a);
00149         u2 = (-b - s) * 1000 / (2 * a);
00150     }
00151     
00152     retIntersect1.x = A.x + u1 * (B.x - A.x) / 1000;
00153     retIntersect1.y = A.y + u1 * (B.y - A.y) / 1000;
00154     retIntersect2.x = A.x + u2 * (B.x - A.x) / 1000;
00155     retIntersect2.y = A.y + u2 * (B.y - A.y) / 1000;
00156     return true;
00157 }

00159 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00160 void TestCircle()
00161 {
00162      Vector circle, p1, p2, intersect1, intersect2;
00163      bool success;
00164      
00165      VectorInit(circle, -50, -50, 0);
00166      VectorInit(p1, 0, 0, 0);
00167      VectorInit(p2, -100, -100, 0);
00168      
00169      success = CircleIntersectLine(circle, 50, p1, p2, intersect1, intersect2);
00170      TEST((success == true), "Intersection");
00171      
00172      //VectorPrint(intersect1, "Intersect1", 2000);
00173      //VectorPrint(intersect2, "Intersect2", 2000);
00174      
00175      TEST((intersect1.x == -85), "intersect1.x");
00176      TEST((intersect1.y == -85), "intersect1.y");
00177      TEST((intersect2.x == -14), "intersect2.x");
00178      TEST((intersect2.y == -14), "intersect2.y");
00179      
00180      VectorInit(circle, 0, 0, 0);
00181      VectorInit(p1, 0, 0, 0);
00182      VectorInit(p2, 1000, 0, 0);
00183 
00184      success = CircleIntersectLine(circle, 30, p1, p2, intersect1, intersect2);
00185      TEST((success == true), "Intersection 2");
00186 
00187      //VectorPrint(intersect1, "Intersect1a", 2000);
00188      //VectorPrint(intersect2, "Intersect2a", 2000);
00189 
00190      TEST((intersect1.x == 30), "intersect1.x");
00191      TEST((intersect1.y == 0), "intersect1.y");
00192      TEST((intersect2.x == -30), "intersect2.x");
00193      TEST((intersect2.y == 0), "intersect2.y");
00194 }
00195 #endif /* ENABLE_TEST */
00196 #endif /* __CIRCLE_H_ */
